product_name: REI Table Top French Coffee Press - 48 fl. oz.
long_description: Enjoy the rich, smooth flavor of French press coffee from the comfort of your campsite with the REI Table Top French coffee press. Simple to use-add coarse ground coffee or loose-leaf tea and near-boiling water; let steep for 4 min. then press the plunger and pour. Built-in spout has a fine-mesh screen to filter out the grounds while you pour. Vacuum-insulated, double-walled stainless-steel carafe keeps your beverage hot. Large 48 fl. oz. capacity holds enough coffee for your whole group. Handwash the REI Table Top French coffee press with soap and warm water.
short_description: Enjoy the rich, smooth flavor of French press coffee from the comfort of your campsite with the REI Table Top French coffee press.
